text.section:
Sec. 8E-7. Crane siting.
Together with the permit documents, the permit applicant shall submit to the Building Official all required applications and/or approvals related to the operation of the crane on site, including, but not limited to, any required by the Federal Aviation Administration pursuant to 14 CFR Part 77 and FAA Advisory Circular AC70/7460-2K and the Miami-Dade County Transit Adjacent Construction Manual.
